question: What are the most Earth-like exoplanets discovered so far, and can you generate an image of one of them?

steps.content: What are the most Earth-like exoplanets discovered so far, and can you generate an image of one of them?
Plan: 1) Search for the most Earth-like exoplanets discovered so far. 2) Generate an image of one of these exoplanets. 3) Return the answer.
Searching for the most Earth-like exoplanets discovered so far.
The most Earth-like exoplanets include Kepler-452b, Proxima Centauri b, and TRAPPIST-1e.
Can you provide more details about Kepler-452b?
Plan: 1) Search for detailed information about Kepler-452b. 2) Return the answer.
Searching for detailed information about Kepler-452b.
Kepler-452b is located 1,400 light-years away in the constellation Cygnus. It is 60% larger than Earth and orbits its star in 385 days.
